searchSuggestions: this is an array of discussion headlines from the server and also locally. They'd be combined. if the user clicks on a guides tile, then the guides will be brought up cause they're local. If they click on the community suggestion tile, then that discussion will be fetched using the discussion id.

guides.note: the discussionLink comes only in responses in the support website. This is from deep-linking purposes as the user will be immediately taken to the discussion page in the community website on-clicking any of these tiles
